name: Rolly Golfy
description:
Rolly Golfy is a simple and chaotic platformer game, where you don't directly control your character, but are left to the whims of the Gods of Random!

Hurl your way through a variety of levels, crash on obstacles, bounce on things, sink and the bottom of the ocean and start again and again. How fast will you reach the end?

A sample of gameplay Key features:
  • Simple and pretty animated low-poly world
  • A multitude of effects, which one will you draw next?
  • Frustratingly fun physics mechanics. Why did it land on that face, again, whyyy?
  • Cumulative score. How low can you go? Can you beat your previous score?
  • Can you do a perfect run and only do hole-in-ones?
The effects you will have to face during playing!
